DataElement.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction Breast Tissue Expander Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date related to breast reconstruction (surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy) using a breast tissue expander (an inflatable reservoir that is used to expand the remaining breast skin after a mastectomy and prior to surgical reconstruction) performed (executed and carried through to completion).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Breast Reconstruction Breast Tissue Expander Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to breast reconstruction (surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy) using a breast tissue expander (an inflatable reservoir that is used to expand the remaining breast skin after a mastectomy and prior to surgical reconstruction) performed (executed and carried through to completion).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Breast Reconstruction Breast Tissue Expander Performed
Property.preferredDefinition: Surgery to rebuild a breast's shape after a mastectomy.:An inflatable reservoir that is used to expand the remaining breast skin after a mastectomy and prior to surgical reconstruction.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: An inflatable reservoir that is used to expand the remaining breast skin after a mastectomy and prior to surgical reconstruction.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
